title: CybertionDirector Ultra 2.0.0906.0 Multilingual Activated
description:
CyberLink ActionDirector Ultra 2.0.0906.0 Multilingual

ActionDirector is for the action camera enthusiast. It's the ultimate action cam accessory and the best way to create powerful action videos that showcase all the excitement of your footage. On top of that it's incredibly quick and easy to use, putting the power of movie making into the hands of even complete beginners.

Create high-impact, pro videos that showcase the action
Action cameras are the best way to record your adventures. Turning that raw footage into action-packed highlight reels of excitement that are ready to share is what ActionDirector is designed for. And thereÃ¢Â€â„¢s nothing that does it better!

Super-Fluid Slow Motion Action
- Import footage taken at 120 and even 240 frames per second (FPS) and export at the same frame rate to achieve fluid slow motion effects in your videos.
- Apply color and lens corrections to 120/240 FPS footage while maintaining the high quality of your original video.
- Apply slow motion to just parts of a clip, not to an entire video section. No time-consuming video splitting.

Incredible 4K Movies
Action Audio
No Annoying Format Conversions
Instant Action Movies
Drag 'n' Drop Storyboard Creation
One-click Corrections
Clean and Clever Workspace
All-in-one Action


What's New in Version 2.0.0906.0:
- 360-degree Video Editing (NEW)
- Switch between 360-degree and 2D viewing modes
- Trim, add titles, effects and transitions
- Upload 360-degree video directly to YouTube and
- Stop Motion Effect (NEW)
- Zoom-and-Pan Effect (NEW)
- Ultra HD 4K Production (NEW)
- Intelligent SVRT (UNIQUE)

System Requirements:
- Microsoft Windows 10, 8.1/8, 7
- 1024 x 768, 16-bit color
- 2 GB RAM
- 2 GB space for installation
- Intel Core i3 or AMD A6 processor.
- ATI/AMD: Radeon HD 7000 series
- NVIDIA: GeForce GTX 600 series
- Intel: HD Graphics
